author: travelandtourworld.com
title: 16th Annual Goodwill Gridiron Halloween PartyTravelandtourworld.com
text:
16th Annual Goodwill Gridiron Halloween Party Published on : Sunday, September 20, 2015
Join the Baltimore Ravens and Goodwill Industries of the Chesapeake, Inc. at the 16th Annual Goodwill Gridiron Halloween party on Monday, October 12th at Dave & Buster’s in Arundel Mills Mall from 7 pm to 11 pm. This year’s hosts include Dennis Pitta, Justin Tucker and Brandon Williams.
Through the years of this special party many of the most famous Ravens have attended, including Hall of Famers Jonathan Ogden and Shannon Sharpe, along with Joe Flacco, Todd Heap and Ray Lewis. More Ravens are expected at this year’s Gridiron celebration. The event will raise nearly $135,000 for Goodwill’s training and employment programs serving individuals with barriers to employment.
The party will include video games, billiards, bowling, dancing, a costume contest, catered food, an open bar and a silent auction. Items to be auctioned include a trip to Australia, Cypress, Disney World, gift certificates from many local restaurants and hotels, autographed memorabilia from the Ravens, The Rolling Stones, Kiss, Taylor Swift and much more.
“We had a blast at last year’s Gridiron and we’re looking forward to coming back,” said Justin Tucker. “Goodwill does outstanding work in our community, helping those who need it the most reach independence and stability.”
“The Gridiron Halloween party is always a great time, and it wouldn’t be possible without the support of the Baltimore Ravens and our generous corporate partners,” said Lisa Rusyniak, President & CEO of Goodwill Industries of the Chesapeake, Inc. “Additionally, the funds raised support our job training and placement programs.”
